summary: FUEL LINE DISOLVED CAUSING FIRE HAZARD, I  STARTED ENGINE IN GARAGE AND GASOLINE STARTED SPRAYING OUT AT HIGH VOLUME DUE TO FUEL INJECTION PUMP PRESSURE. MAJOR FIRE HAZARD. 2007 CANAM OULANDER 800 CC. APPROVED TO DRIVE ON PUBLIC STREETS IN ARIZONA. FUEL LINE LEAK WAS NOT THE RESULT OF ABRASION, WAS DUE TO DETERIORATION.
